actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: To their surprise, they find a teddy bear on the ground, one marked with several peace symbols.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: For some odd reason, a masked child pops out of nowhere. Clearly this cannot be good.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: It seems like the tables have turned against our heroes. Oh man, they’re about to get beat by a teddy bear. With peace symbols. Doesn’t that suck?
